Class Car

Car
Direct Known Subclasses:
LuxCar, NormalCar

  • Constructor Details

    • Car

      public Car(int current_car_id, int current_car_type, int current_station_number, int current_destination)
      Construct a new Car object with initial values for properties.
      Parameters:
      current_car_id - the ID of the car.
      current_car_type - the type of the car.
      current_station_number - the number of the station where the car is initially located.
      current_destination - the number of the station where the car is headed to.

    • dropOff

      public void dropOff()
      Drops off passengers at their destination and updates the fares collected for the car. Prints out the passenger ID, initial booking time, and drop off time for each passenger.
